description.value:
Your delves into the darkest secrets of life and death have prepared you for the understanding necessary to comprehend undead magic. You become trained in Undead Lore, a special lore skill that can be used to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge} regarding undead creatures, haunts, and effects caused by undead creatures or other necromancers, but that can't be used to Recall Knowledge of other topics.

At 3rd level, you become an expert in Undead Lore; at 7th level, you become a master in Undead Lore; and at 15th level, you become legendary in Undead Lore.
